name: josephoche
description: Part 1: Hardhat vs Foundry ### Section 1 | Feature            | Hardhat                            | Foundry                             | |--------------------|-------------------------------------|--------------------------------------| | Language Support   | JavaScript/TypeScript               | Solidity native scripting (Forge)   | | Compilation        | Customizable via plugins            | Extremely fast built-in compiler    | | Testing Framework  | Mocha/Chai                          | Forge (Solidity-based)              | | Deployment         | JavaScript/TypeScript scripts       | Solidity-native scripts             | | Tooling            | Rich plugin ecosystem               | Minimal, focused tooling            | | IDE Integration    | Great with VS Code                  | Primarily CLI-based                 | | Learning Curve     | Easier for JS developers            | Easier for Solidity developers      | | Gas Reporting      | Via plugin                          | Built-in with high performance      |
